TopicTitle: [Video] Tutorial to Engineer and Build your own Space Station

Articles.Content:
Building a Space Station tutorial in four parts going through building from the beginning, rendezvous and docking and even tools that you can use to make your life easier.

Part 1

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/qX1PFqBPMaA?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-20T18:21:19Z" title="06/20/2015 06:21  PM" data-short="9 yr">June 20, 2015</time> by Orb8Ter**
Good series, but wasteful. In a career mode I would be more frugal with my money rockets and fuel. ![;)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_wink.gif)

True but i started playing KSP when there was no career mode so Im used to sandbox, and I feel that showing others how to do things and if they do this in career mode then they still have a chance to learn the rest of the game the fun way 'Trial and Error'

or also known as 'Trial and Explosions' method ![:D](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_cheesy.gif)
